title: EMERGE: Enhancing Multimodal Electronic Health Records Predictive Modeling with Retrieval-Augmented Generation
details: Y Zhu, C Ren, Z Wang, X Zheng, S Xie, J Feng, X Zhu… - Proceedings of the 33rd …, 2024
abstract: The integration of multimodal Electronic Health Records (EHR) data has significantly advanced clinical predictive capabilities. Existing models, which utilize clinical notes and multivariate time-series EHR data, often fall short of incorporating the necessary …
